mapper.select: SELECT P.DOC_NO ,P.DOC_EMAIL ,P.DOC_NICK ,P.DOC_NAME ,P.DOC_GENDER ,P.DOC_BIG_NAME ,P.DOC_KIND ,P.DOC_AGE ,P.DOC_SIDO ,P.DOC_SIGUNGU ,P.DOC_ADDRESS ,P.DOC_SUBJECT ,P.DOC_CONTENT ,P.DOC_DATE ,P.DOC_UPD_DATE ,P.DOC_READCOUNT , (SELECT COUNT(R.DOC_NO) FROM PAYANG_REPLY R WHERE P.DOC_NO = R.DOC_NO ) AS REPLY_COUNT FROM PAYANG P ORDER BY P.DOC_NO DESC ,P.DOC_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM payang_reply WHERE doc_no = #{doc_no} ORDER BY doc_ref ASC, doc_cno DESC, doc_date DESC
